channel.title: LaTex on Shengting Cao's Note Book
channel.description: Recent content in LaTex on Shengting Cao's Note Book

item.title: Using LaTex
item.description: Enable the LaTex expression in MarkDown files for github page Add this HTML code into the template that you will use for every website. I choose to put it into site-footer.html <!-- enable math in the blog --> <!DOCTYPE html> <!-- KaTeX requires the use of the HTML5 doctype. Without it, KaTeX may not render properly --> <html> <head> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/katex@0.11.1/dist/katex.min.css" integrity="sha384-zB1R0rpPzHqg7Kpt0Aljp8JPLqbXI3bhnPWROx27a9N0Ll6ZP/+DiW/UqRcLbRjq" crossorigin="anonymous"> <!-- The loading of KaTeX is deferred to speed up page rendering --> <script defer src="https://cdn.
